swipe_text: Swipe left/right on this area to change slide
aboute_gallery_shortText:
The gallery was created as a code sample.

It was written using the Vue. Uses images from unsplash.

Used libraries:
used_library:
• Vue.js, Vue - Router, Vue - Store, Vue - Vuex, Vue - I18n
  • Sass/SCSS
  • Bootstrap
  • axios.js for Vue
  • TweenMax.js for Vue
